title: Dropmail - An embeddable email collection form
description: A minimal, embeddable email collection form built for collecting newsletter signups across multiple properties (portfolio sites, Notion pages, etc.) with bot protection and source tracking.

title: libp2p-broadcast protocol implementation
description: The protocol is designed to fix the inefficiencies of libp2p-scatter, which creates a new substream and handshake for every message. Instead, it uses two long-lived substreams per peer—one inbound and one outbound—reducing RTT overhead and improving throughput. It keeps the same interface as libp2p-scatter, making it a drop-in replacement.

title: DOG Gossip protocol implementation in Rust libp2p
description: I implemented the DOG protocol as a Rust libp2p module, and benchmarked it against the existing Gossipsub implementation.

title: P2P Modular Pyramidal Overlay (MPO) Protocol
description: I designed and implemented a scalable, Modular Pyramidal Overlay (MPO) protocol leveraging state-of-the-art protocols to construct balanced, resilient, and low-diameter overlays. This work is part of Malachite, a flexible BFT consensus engine in Rust.

title: A Starknet Transactions Batcher
description: The article describes the Metacube transaction batcher used to instantly send earned NFTs to players. It explains its scalable actor-based architecture and includes a detailed Go implementation.

title: A Guide on Starknet Signatures
description: The article explains how signing and signature verification work on Starknet under Account Abstraction. It includes TypeScript and Go examples for signing messages and verifying signatures using either a public key or an account address.

title: Starknet ID Go Library
description: A Go library to interact with the Starknet.id protocol.

title: Metacube - A massive multiplayer game on Starknet
description: I designed and built the complete backend (DevOps, Infrastructure, API, etc.) of the game. This project is responsible for most of my actual skills and experience in software engineering!

title: Blockchain RPC Censorship Proxy
description: a proxy for JSON-RPC API that censors transactions issued by blacklisted addresses.

title: Minion-L2
description: A tool to deploy a Layer 2 system over an Ethereum Proof of Stake network.

title: Blockchain RPC Byzantine Shield
description: A middleware proxy for blockchain clients designed to mitigate the risks associated with communicating with byzantine nodes. It forwards JSON RPC requests from clients, like Geth, to a pre-configured list of blockchain nodes, and aggregates their responses to detect inconsistencies and return a single, consistent answer.

title: Blockchain Security Evaluation with Twins
description: An adversarial simulation that exposes potential vulnerabilities in the client-node communication of prominent blockchains

title: Linux portable package management
description: A collection of useful bash scripts I was using on my Linux machines.
